name: Negri Electronics
tag_list: high-end-wireless, unlocked-wireless, wireless, wireless-devices, wireless-mobile, mobile
overview: Negri Electronics is a well known distributor of high end unlocked wireless devices and is a privately owned company based out of Las Vegas, Nevada. Currently, they ship to over 190 different countries and is the only company that retails online, offers wholesale and has a drop shipping program available to resellers. The company’s primary focus is their customers and the customer satisfaction with each product and service. Striving to offer the most sought after devices in the world, Negri Electronics works hard to bring these unlocked devices to you before any other company on the market. In order to provide customers with the best service and products, Negri Electronics also prides itself on their hardworking and dedicated staff. They make sure that the customer is always happy, satisfied and thrilled with no only their purchased product, but also their experience with Negri Electronics. With over 19,000 individual sales and over 17,000 unique and happy customers over 5 years, Negri Electronics is a proven leader in the wireless industry and will continue to be for years to come. Negri Electronic’s Mission: To provide our customers with the best possible service, the best high end unlocked wireless devices and the best support after the sale within our means. In addition to providing customers with the most up to date information regarding these new devices while offering the means to purchase them.
